@fountainbridge Also this: https://t.co/MuUXSrnTPM What this story doesn't make clear is that the council controls the company that operates the EICC. So this is council operating as property speculator, and contemplating ditching it's own democratically agreed masterplan for site.

@fountainbridge TXCC had a deputation at the meeting as well as FCI to complain. Decision has been thrown to full Council at end of month, Have to say when trying to fight for the community having part of the meeting in private kills us dead. They who have knowledge have the power sadly.
